name: Finistere Ireland Management Ltd
goal: Finistere Ireland Management Ltd is responsible for the management of the Irish AgTech Fund, investing in Irish-related agriculture and food technology opportunities.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Digital economy and society, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: FIM is the management entity that has been retained by the Irish AgTech Fund (100% funded by the Irish Sovereign Fund) to identify and invest in new technologies in the Agriculture and Food industries, particularly in Ireland. The focus of the targeted technologies is to promote better yields in commodities, higher quality products, improved sustainability, and further the growth of high quality and high paid tech jobs in Ireland within the agriculture and food sectors.
